Text: I wish I knew why every time I post a description of an upload, some of the fonts/words get screwed up. Anyone got a clue how to fix this?
You are using 'curly quotes' and apostrophes instead of plain text ... They are seen as characters, and that's what you see printed here.
Thanks, Senseninai. So apostrophes and parentheses won't work...how strange. I wish TPB would give us some formatting options to create better descriptions of our uploads.

never mind... 
your uploads are still excellent...
